name: pizzabot
0:
”Alexa, launch pizza bot”
”Ask pizza bot, I need pizza”
”Ask pizza bot, I need toppings”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pizza bot
des: You can ask for pizza types, after choosing one you will be able to get available toppings. Once choosing toppings you should be able to proceed to order.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
